Class LexWSBBSLDA

  • java.lang.Object
    • yang.weiwei.lda.LDA
      • yang.weiwei.lda.slda.SLDA

  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LexWSBMedLDA

    public class LexWSBBSLDA
extends BSLDA
    BS-LDA with lexical weights and weighted stochastic block priors
    Author:
    Weiwei Yang
